archimate:Assessment.name: Tech Services lack the necessary skills and experience
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
A quick search was performed in CV Partner based on a few simple keywords and comparing Connect and Transform together with Create.
CV Partner contains - 1 Tech Services CV with the mention of "DevOps" (Create has 1070) - 2 Tech Services CV's with the mention of "Programming" (Create has 1895) - 0 Tech Services CV's with the mention of DigiOps (Create has 4)
Although this of course is not conclusive, it indicates that there's a skill gap and that Tech Services is going to have a problem with the transformation. A quick search was performed in CV Partner based on a few simple keywords and comparing Connect and Transform together with Create.
CV Partner contains - 0 Tech Services CV with the skill "Artificial Intelligence" (Create has 118) - 0 Tech Services CV's with the mention of "Generative AI" (Create has 11)
Although this of course is not conclusive, it indicates that there's a skill gap and that Tech Services is going to have a problem with the transformation.
